traditional: 槓桿
gànggǎn lever

traditional: 勾結
gōujié collude with; collaborate with; gang up with

traditional: 感謝
gǎnxiè (express) thanks; gratitude; grateful; thankful; thanks

traditional: 反過來
fǎnguolái conversely; in reverse order; in an opposite direction
fǎnguòlái conversely

traditional: 調和
tiáohé harmonious; harmony
děngděng etcetera; and so on ..; wait a minute!; hold on!
bùděngshì inequality
wǔtái (theatrical or political) stage; arena

traditional: 外來
wàilái external; foreign; outside
sīyǒuzhì private ownership of property

traditional: 柔軟
róuruǎn soft
míngliàng brightness
miáoshù to describe

traditional: 簡化
jiǎnhuà simplify

traditional: 調幅
diàofú amplitude modulation

traditional: 擔負
dānfù shoulder; bear; take on; be charged with

traditional: 罷了
bàle a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
bàliǎo a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
lìxi interest (on a loan)
